title: Straight A at Stanford and on to Harvard
description: This book is an "educational coach" to help students do better in school and on standardized tests.It is for high school, college and graduate students.The book can help transform a C student into an A+ student.The book helps students to navigate the academic world of standardized teste, competitive colleges like Stanford and also how to excel in the graduate world at places like the University of Illinois, Northwestern and Harvard.The author was the Student Athlete of the Year at Stanford and went on to graduate at the top of his medical school class with 99% board scores in medical school and residency.The book explains in detail how any motivated student can dramatically improve their academic performance and be more successful.
author: Peter  Rogers
